content.rendered:
Do you want to receive news and extra content about Blue Volta before everyone else?

We will only send it once a month and you will get some free wallpapers as a gift!

Here’s what you are going to get:

  • Development updates
  • Edgar’s special recipes
  • Stuff we like – what we have read, played and listened to this month
  • Latest news about piromancy (just kidding)
